articles.description: England prop Joe Marler is awaiting to hear if he will be cited by the RFU after appearing to spark a big brawl in the Harlequins v Bristol Bears clash on Tuesday
articles.content:
Joe Marler's hopes of being recalled by England for the 2023 Six Nations are now in serious doubt with the prop facing a ban. 
 On Tuesday, in the game between Harlequins and Bristol Bears, the prop… [+1973 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Leeks
articles.title: Stefan Bajcetic almost handed Liverpool fine after being stitched up by teammate - The Mirror
articles.description: Stefan Bajcetic came off the bench to score Liverpool's win-sealing goal against Aston Villa, but his unfamiliarity to the club's fines system almost landed him in hot water with James Milner
articles.content:
Wonderkid Stefan Bajcetic has burst onto the scene at Liverpool by scoring the win-sealing goal against Aston Villa on Boxing Day.
 The midfielder has been around Jurgen Klopp's senior squad for muc… [+3180 chars]
